Articles.Content:
So I've been looking for a mod that lets me cover up probes with an aerodynamic shell rather than having it sit on top of a rocket, looking silly. I've been searching for it but I can't find what mod does this (since I don't really know what terms to use for search). Any help will be greatly appreciated

Example. Note how the top of the rocket has that neat aero cover-up shell:

The term you are looking for is fairings.

There's the Procedural Fairings mod, which will make fairings to fit your payload, and KWRocketry has some fairings as well.

Link to Procedural Fairings my good sir!

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/39512-0-23-Procedural-Fairings-2-4-3-tech-tree-and-minor-improvements-%28Dec-18%29
